UnknownPage.description: This page indicates an issue with the website's SSL certificate.

elements.name: Invalid SSL certificate Header
elements.description: The main header indicating the SSL certificate issue.

elements.name: Error Code
elements.description: Error code associated with the SSL issue.

elements.name: Cloudflare Link
elements.description: Link to Cloudflare for more information.

elements.name: Browser Status
elements.description: Indicates the browser is working correctly.

elements.name: Host Error
elements.description: Indicates an error with the host.

elements.name: What happened?
elements.description: Section header explaining the SSL issue.

assertions: Text 'The origin web server does not have a valid SSL certificate.' is displayed
